book.synopsis: Master defense attorney Perry Mason is hired by a young woman to protect her scandalous and headstrong halfsister, Eleanor Corbin, from the consequences of her last escapade. Reissue.
book.title_long: The Case of the Glamorous Ghost (A Perry Mason Mystery)
